value.name: Sheriff: Idanha man arrested for kidnapping, strangulation after resisting arrest
value.description: Linn County Sheriff's deputies responded to a domestic disturbance Sunday night on Cedar Avenue in Idanha. The suspect, Christopher Walker, 52, of Idanha, forced his ex-girlfriend into a room at her residence and strangled her,

value.name: Investigation launched as historic South Shields building damaged in bank holiday blaze
value.description: An investigation is underway after the Grade II-listed Victoria Hall building in Fowler Street, South Shields, suffered damage to its roof following a fire late on Saturday, May 29. Tyne and Wear Fire and Rescue (TWFRS) crews were on the scene at Fowler Street for around four hours after being called to the incident shortly before 11pm.

video.name: Investigation launched as historic South Shields building damaged in bank holiday blaze

value.name: Idanha man arrested for alleged domestic assault
value.description: Christopher Walker, 52, is accused of forcing his former girlfriend into a room at her residence and strangling her.

value.name: Supreme Court rejects retired officer's bid to curb legal immunity for police
value.description: As the nation wrestles with cases of police excessive force, the Supreme Court on Monday refused to take up a case involving legal immunity for federal officers.

value.name: Rochford axe thug threatened to chop woman's head off
value.description: AN AXE-WIELDING thug threatened to cut a woman's head off - but initially claimed he had the weapon to cut down his grandparents' trees.

value.name: Business leaders call for action on ‘Mass and Cass’
value.description: The Newmarket Business Association is meeting with the city and Janey, but the group is also calling on prosecutors, the courts, and the city of Quincy to help. “I just think everyone should be on the same page and help disrupt the dynamic here to get drug dealers and violent offenders off the streets and get back to real goals of helping people out of addiction and homelessness,
